column1: 711516,Rubber Production Machine Operator,,"Monitor equipment operation to ensure no flaws
column3: Operate plastic or rubber forming equipment
column5: Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column7: Place materials into or onto moulds
column11: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
column17: Compare physical characteristics of materials or products to specifications or standards
column19: Safely handle chemicals for work applications
column21: Prepare moulds or casts for production
column27: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column29: Select production equipment according to product specifications
column31: Trim excess material from work pieces
column33: Review blueprints or other instructions to determine operational methods or sequences
column39: Mix substances to create chemical solutions",0.08585341518069671
